details.flavorText: The typical spriggan is a bully who prefers to take live prisoners in fights, but only to ensure that they have a large stock of living victims to torment, tease, and abuse. They train to use weapons in nonlethal ways that inflict the maximum amount of pain even as they guard against accidental death. When not bullying prisoners or hunting for new victims, spriggan bullies enjoy drinking, watching others fight, and fighting among themselves.

description.value:
A high-frequency sonic attack shatters a nearby object. You deal 2d10 sonic damage to the object, ignoring the object's Hardness if it is 4 or lower.

Heightened The damage increases by 1d10, and the Hardness the spell ignores increases by 2.
description.label: Description

description.value:
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 2.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 3 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened You can target up to five creatures.
description.label: Description

description.value: You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move any number of lights up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within 120 feet of you and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.
description.label: Description

description.value: Trigger The spriggan bully takes damage; Effect The spriggan bully grows to Large size, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan bully's reach increases by 5 feet. They regain 5 Hit Points and gain a [[/r +2 # status bonus to melee attacks and damage]] status bonus to melee attacks and damage rolls. This effect continues until the end of the spriggan bully's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan bully deals damage to another creature and is not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Fatigued], the effect extends until the end of the following turn. When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan bully is fatigued for 1 hour.
The spriggan bully makes a morningstar Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. This attack is nonlethal.

The spriggan bully's Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d6 # precision damage]] precision damage to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Flat-Footed] creatures.
When the monster Strikes a creature that has the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Flat-Footed] condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.
